Name: Celebration
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Reminiscent of a brandy-based Negroni served straight-up.
History: Created in 2015 by Devis D'Ercole at Imperial Beach, San Benedetto del Tronto, Marche, Italy. Originally with Martini Rubino vermouth .
Nutrition: One serving of Celebration contains 185 calories
